channel.title: ~Mopar Server Status Checker Question~
channel.description:
hey, first off, it's an awesome addition.
but, i think you should be able to remove your server from the list...the reason being that my server is having a new member from this site connecting to it every minute, which is the server checker. it filled up all of my open spots, and was giving me HELL with lag. if i can remove my server from the list, could someone tell me? and if i cant, someone really should make this change[br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 05:20:06 PM[/size][hr]and also, tell me what you think :P

item.title: ~Mopar Server Status Checker Question~
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

i didnt mean an open delete button, i meant that you can only delete the servers that you have added, and maybe they could know what servers ere yours by having you log into your mopar account to add a server

Read full topic

item.title: ~Mopar Server Status Checker Question~
item.dc:creator: @Hyjall Hyjall
item.description:
@Hyjall wrote:

Well, it would be pretty dumb to just add this feature because we just know someone is gonna remove all Servers. But, maybe something that you can attach a email to your server and delete it via mail?

Read full topic
